item.description:
Something TOTALLY different for September's brunch....

Boston Harbor Cruises does a Harbor Cruise that includes brunch !

The boat boards at Long Wharf beginning at 11:30 and the 2 hour tour is from 12:00-2:00

Brunch buffet is served and David Coffin ﻿will share his unique take on Boston's rich and vibrant history.

Here's a link:

http://www.bostonharborcruises.com/boston-harbor-cruises/brunch-cruise.aspx

We will meet by the ticket window at 11:15. 

Everyone is responsible to purchase their own tickets.  Please purchase  your tickets as soon as possible.  I spoke with the cruise company and they said the brunch cruise is usually sold out several days before it happens.  

Tickets are $37.50 plus tax.  You can order them over the phone or on line.

If you're interested in car pooling to Boston, let me know and we'll make arrangements.

This should be a lot of fun.  I'm really looking forward to it.  Hope you join us.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet by the ticket window at 11:15
item.name: September Brunch - Boston Harbor Brunch Cruise
